mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store_stock WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND shelf_id = #{shelfId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store_stock (product_id, shelf_id, quantity) VALUES (#{productId}, #{shelfId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store_stock ORDER BY last_updated DESC

SELECT ss.id, ss.product_id as productId, p.name as productName, p.barcode as productBarcode, ss.shelf_id as shelfId, s.name as shelfName, ss.quantity, p.unit_weight as unitWeight, TO_CHAR(ss.last_updated, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lastUpdated FROM store_stock ss JOIN product p ON ss.product_id = p.id JOIN shelf s ON ss.shelf_id = s.id ORDER BY ss.last_updated DESC
